name: LS EW75
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Includes 2 versions - 1 shows weather desc, 1 shows ram

Installed to /var/mobile/Library/LockHTML (for LS) and /SBHTML (for HS)

Apply with XenHTML

Requires XenInfo for weather/battery components to work properly

Need help? Link to tutorials in my pinned tweet
